title: House for sale in Pita Kotte ( Gated Community )
details:
* A completely newly refurbished house located in a gated community, 3 bedroom house for sale in Kotte, All bedrooms come with en-suite bathrooms, 8.85 perches land extent, A/C, living, dining, open pantry, wet kitchen, TV room, walk in closet, a garage and maids quarters.

* Price- 31 million, selling for highest offer.

* Inspection only through Appointment! Brokers will not be entertained!
